parameters.name: Host
parameters.description: The endpoint that is used to connect to the database.

parameters.name: Port
parameters.description: The port that is used to connect to the database.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description:
The system identifier (SID) of the database.

>  The SID uniquely identifies an Oracle database. After a database is created, a SID is generated for the database.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The ID of the tenant. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) operation to query the ID of the tenant.
